content: this cowl has a fairly easy geometric color-work pattern that knits up quickly in dk weight yarn for folks living in cold climates it s a nice light layer to pull on with any outfit and to wear indoors or out finished measurements circumference 18 23 27 5 height 5 5 10 10 materials mc malabrigo dos tierras 50% merino wool 3 5oz/100g 210yds/193m 1 hank whale s road #247 cc malabrigo dos tierras 50%merino wool/50% baby alpaca 3 5oz/100g 210yds/193m 1 hank gris #212 size 4 3 5 mm 16 16 24 circular needle size 6 4 mm 16 16 24 circular needle 1 stitch marker gauge 21 stitches & 26 rounds = 4 inches in color work pattern stitch please check gauge and adjust needle size as needed
